threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factors were that it has known exploits and it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: ASCII text, with very long lines (65312u), with CRLF, LF line terminators

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation

match_context.values:
@{ScriptBlockText=_DIRECTORY -Value $IMAGE_EXPORT_DIRECTORY
      $Attributes = 'AutoLayout, AnsiClass, Class, Public, SequentialLayout, Sealed, BeforeFieldInit'

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\sysnative\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -File "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\LBB_PS1.ps1"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -ex bypass -nonI C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\LBB_PS1.ps1 ; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects when an attacker or tool disables the  Windows Defender service (WinDefend) via the registry
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Jn Trencansk, frack113, AlertIQ, Nasreddine Bencherchali

match_context.values: @{RuleName=T1031,T1050; EventID=13; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\system32\services.exe; Details=DWORD (0x00000004); TargetObject=HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\WinDefend\Start}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Disable Windows Event Logging Via Registry
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects tampering with the "Enabled" registry key in order to disable Windows logging of a Windows event channel

match_context.values: @{EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Details=DWORD (0x00000000); TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\AirSpaceChannel\Enabled}

@{Details=DWORD (0x00000000); EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\AMSI/Debug\Enabled}

@{Details=DWORD (0x00000000); EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\Analytic\Enabled}

@{Details=DWORD (0x00000000); EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\DebugChannel\Enabled}

@{EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Details=DWORD (0x00000000); TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\DirectShowFilterGraph\Enabled}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change Winevt Channel Access Permission Via Registry
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects tampering with the "ChannelAccess" registry key in order to change access to Windows event channel.

match_context.values: @{Details=O:BAG:SYD:(A;;0x1;;;SY)(A;;0x5;;;BA)(A;;0x1;;;LA); EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\AirSpaceChannel\ChannelAccess}

@{EventType=SetValue; Details=O:BAG:SYD:(A;;0x1;;;SY)(A;;0x5;;;BA)(A;;0x1;;;LA); Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\AMSI/Debug\ChannelAccess}

@{Details=O:BAG:SYD:(A;;0x1;;;SY)(A;;0x5;;;BA)(A;;0x1;;;LA); EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\DebugChannel\ChannelAccess}

@{EventID=13; Details=O:BAG:SYD:(A;;0x1;;;SY)(A;;0x5;;;BA)(A;;0x1;;;LA); Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventType=SetValue; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\DirectShowFilterGraph\ChannelAccess}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the disabling of the Windows Defender eventlog as seen in relation to Lockbit 3.0 infections

match_context.values: @{EventID=13; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Details=DWORD (0x00000000); TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WINEVT\Channels\Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational\Enabled}
